pages.text: $(li)The Frozen River is a variant of the River biome in which its surface is composed of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is mainly composed of Clay, Sand, and rarely, Driftwood logs.

$(li)You can find some water vegetation like Seagrass or Tall Purle Pickerelweed.$(br)$(li)Some aquatic animals can like Salmons, Cods, $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/pike)Pikes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l) can be found inside of the water of this place.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Frozen River$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
